about_the_game:
Get them home! We need you to defend Billy and his crew on his way to the extraction zone at Drop city #237. The transport ship “Lockheed” has been shot down and crash landed on the desert Planet Kernas! You have been authorized to use the defense system to escort them on their way. Defend them from giant bugs, malfunctioning droids and more…


Their journey to safety will be shown through a hand drawn comic.
Make sure the enemy does not breach the defensive gates or Billy won't make it home!

5 base towers with each their own function. Make the choice to upgrade them into one of two branching specializations each. Totaling 15 unique towers to choose from, each with their own special abilities. That can be upgraded even further! Will you burn your enemies with the flamethrower or perhaps simply snipe them from afar? The choice is yours! 

You don’t have to count on just your towers! You can use powerful abilities to get you out of a tight spot!

48 unlockable skills to acquire!  Earn medals based on your performance in missions and use those to unlock them. Get new active abilities or improve the ones you have already. Or maybe you prefer to upgrade the abilities of your towers? Notice that what you unlocked isn't working for you? Reset your skills and redistribute them as you see fit!

Your towers are powerful but so are your enemies! They have their own skills to help each other break through your defenses. Place your towers wisely to counter their special abilities.

  • 16 Playable levels: Traverse 4 different Biomes and lay waste to your enemies!

  • 5 Base towers: Each upgradeable from MK I to MK III then you specialize them!

  • 10 Tower Specializations: Choose between 2 specializations for each of your base towers. Each with their own special upgradeable skills. 

  • 3 Difficulties: Determine your own difficulty from easy to hard. How fast can you handle the waves?

  • 2 Game modes: Regular and Hardcore. Is the normal game too easy? Try Hardcore where you play through the game with just one hit point,1 medal per completed level, no skill resets and always hard difficulty. Good luck!

  • 4 Active abilities: Support your towers with your own abilities, which can be upgraded through unlockable skills!

  • 48 Unlockable skills: Earn medals by completing levels and use these to unlock powerful upgrades for abilities and towers!

  • Database: A collection of data about encountered enemies. To learn about your enemies or specific aspects of a tower.

  • Over 30 Enemies: Each with their own abilities and behavior.

  • 3 Boss fights: Big, mean and not easily killed.

  • Comic: 12 hand drawn pages telling the story of Billy and his crew. Rewatchable in its own Database.

  • Customization: Choose from several different colors for your UI. Because not everyone likes the same colors.
